name: Virulence
description: The speed at which the vulnerability can be exploited.

values.name: Slow
values.description: Steps 1-4 of the kill chain cannot be reliably automated for this vulnerability for some reason. These steps are reconnaissance, weaponization, delivery, and exploitation.

values.name: Rapid
values.description: Steps 1-4 of the of the kill chain can be reliably automated. If the vulnerability allows remote code execution or command injection, the default response should be rapid.
